# AIdrac

**AI-Powered Out-of-Band Management**

Alias for [`mcp-server-aidrac`](https://pypi.org/project/mcp-server-aidrac/).

```bash
pip install aidrac
```

The open alternative to iDRAC, iLO, and IPMI.

- DTMF telephone control
- Ultrasonic audio (ggwave)
- ntfy push notifications
- I-Poll AI messaging

Part of HumoticaOS - One love, one fAmIly!
